title: AFTRS 1994 graduate showreel. Tapes 1 and 2
abstract: Tape 1: Universal Appliance Co (dir. Andrew Lancaster, 9 min.)--Roses are red (dir. Marcella Hayward, 12 min.)--Pandora's box (dir. Annie Beauchamp, 6 min.)--A Bit of a tiff with the Lord (dir. Peter Duncan, 24 min.)--Bullet proof and blind (dir. Paul Healy, 8 min.)--Fuckwit (dir. Daniel Krige, 18 min.)--Falung (dir. Nina Veretennikova, 20 min.)--Tran the man (dir. Rowan Woods, 17 min.) Tape 2: Unacceptable behaviour (dir. Susan Wallace, 27 min.)--Concrete flesh (dir. Andrew G. Taylor, 9 min.)--Nightwork (dir. Jane Schneider, 13 min.)--The Rockhopper (dir. Wenona Byrne, 13 min.)--It's time (dir. Liz Doran, 12 min.)--Run beside me (dir. Peta Allen Shera, 5 min.)--El Angelito (dir. Guillermo Martin Sepulveda, 20 min.)--Simple (dir. Polly Seddon, 14 min.)
